author: @nillionnetwork
text:
Berlin turns Blue this week.

The Nillion team is in the town attending Berlin Blockchain Week.

If you spot some folks wearing sick merch and chatting about the future of privacy, come say hi! https://t.co/e3a5y9bBPN

author: @nillionnetwork
text:
The Roundtable goes Bloop this Tuesday.

We’re hosting a special @wearebloopers session led by @Jaambutties, pulling back the curtain on how the Bloopers are coming to life.

Expect stories, sneak peeks, and some exclusive alpha.

Link below! https://t.co/n96Be9iY1G

author: @nillionnetwork
text:
Some estimates suggest AI could add around $16 trillion to global GDP by 2030.

But how does that affect you?

It doesn't!

Because that projection is built on the current internet, where big techs steal your data and make billions.

You use the app and they keep the profit. https://t.co/G3Nh0IZAi7
